posts.title: Stuffed Belgian Waffle Maker
posts.content: Infuse your breakfast with a variety of sauces and condiments using this stuffed Belgian waffle maker. Sporting an elegant stainless steel finish, it comes with removable plates for easy cleaning and allows you to adjust the temperature, so you can cook to perfection.

posts.title: Glow In The Dark Air Jordans
posts.content: Get noticed when you walk into the club by keeping your sneaker game on point with the glow in the dark Air Jordan 5 Doernbecher. These one of a kind kicks look great during daytime and even better when the lights are turned off.

posts.title: Honda Super Quiet Portable Generators
posts.content: Keep your electric devices going without having to endure hours of loud background noise by upgrading to these super quiet portable generators from Honda. This 2200-Watt 120-Volt generator operates at 48 to 57 dBA – which is a lower volume than a regular conversation.

posts.title: Floating Crocodile Head
posts.content: Give unsuspecting swimmers the scare of a lifetime by setting this floating crocodile head loose in the pool. Measuring 17.75″ long by 7″ wide, this terrifying pool float features a hauntingly realistic appearance that is guaranteed to send swimmers jumping out of the water.

posts.title: Nerf Rival Khaos MXVI-4000 Blaster
posts.content: Ensure your victory during battle by arming yourself with the NERF Rival Khaos MXVI-4000 blaster. This fully motorized blaster features a rapid fire action capable of shooting 40 soft foam rounds at a velocity up to 100 fps without having to reload.

posts.title: The Flying Pig
posts.content: The day has finally come when pigs fly – kind of! Although this portly little battery operated piggy can’t actually fly on his own, it comes with a ceiling mount so that you hang him and watch him hover in circles as he flaps his little wings up and down.

posts.title: World’s Hottest Chili Pepper
posts.content: Set your insides on fire by taking on the world’s hottest chili pepper. Verified by the good folks at Guinness World Records, this fiery pepper known as the Carolina Reaper boasts an insanely high 2,200,000 Scoville heat units – that’s more than pepper spray!

posts.title: Rechargeable Makeup Brush Cleaner
posts.content: Keep one of your most valued makeup accessories good as new with this rechargeable makeup brush cleaner. It’s compact enough to fit on any nightstand or table and quickly cleans your brush in a just a few seconds.

posts.title: A Practical Guide To Racism Book
posts.content: Learn the proud history of racial profiling and become a knowledgeable new age bigot by reading A Practical Guide to Racism. This provocative read breaks down common stereotypes and examines minorities in detail so you can better understand our multicultural world.

posts.title: Hidden Book Safe
posts.content: Keep your valuables safe by stashing them away in plain sight with the hidden book safe. Upon opening the book, a small compartment is revealed – ideal for hiding cash and small valuables. It’s also lightweight and highly portable, making it excellent for travel.

posts.title: Fluffy Slime Stress Relief Toy
posts.content: Help manage your daily stress levels by taking out your anger and frustration on this fluffy slime stress relief toy. This colorful non-toxic and non-sticky sludge can be stretched, pulled, folded, rolled, and smashed to your heart’s content.

posts.title: Traveler’s 21 Multitool
posts.content: Be ready for whatever comes your way while on the go with the traveler’s 21 multitool. This indispensable multitool features a compact design that carries 21 different tools ranging from three different types of screwdrivers to wrenches and other handy tools.
